responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "2DFCAEC5477DD0310F808E8951BA6883", "We have finally united from the many battlefields of the Riverlands and beyond. Though there are not many left, we, the Knights of Steel Bloom have plotted out a new purpose, the Crusade of Tears! We shall avenge the lost children and imprison the demoness, Deliah. For her horde there is only death.")
name: MADD_0007_BOB_Read_BattleOFBloom_6
